flawed_nl_solution:
Oscar needs to increase his maximum running time from 20 - 2 = <<20-2=22>>22 miles.
Oscar will need a total of 22 / ( 2/3 ) = <<22/(2/3)=33>>33 weeks to prepare.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 22. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
